title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 19 April 2016 - XWiki

10:10 <vmassol> martinus\_\_: yep, xwiki.org has restarted  
10:11 <tmortagne> has quit  
10:17 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
10:34 <fitz> hi. I am learning solr restful api to write android-authenticator. and I found some errors in http://design.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/SolrSchema#HTestResults  
10:35 <fitz> the results of test cases cann't work well and should be modified  
10:36 <fitz> like object\_Blog.BlogPostClass should be object.Blog.BlogPostClass  
10:36 <fitz> property\_Blog.BlogPostClass\_category should be property.Blog.BlogPostClass.category  
10:44 <vmassol> hi fitz  
10:44 <vmassol> I'm not really an expert on the solr schema, but maybe mflorea can confirm they are errors  
10:45 <vmassol> in which case the doc could be edited to fix the mistakes  
10:46 <fitz> yeah, but i have no acccount. how to register?  
10:46 <vmassol> you can register on xwiki.org  
10:46 <vmassol> in the drawer menu, top right  
10:48 <mflorea> fitz: yes, that section needs to be updated  
10:49 <fitz> ok, thank you. :)  
10:49 <mflorea> if you have an account on xwiki.org you can edit and fix the section yourself. I'll review your change. Otherwise I can do the change.  
10:53 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
10:56 <fitz> okay, after test, I will fix and update the document. Thanks  
11:00 <fitz> has quit  
11:40 <mflorea> has quit  
11:53 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
12:01 <vmassol> 14mn for the functional tests for extensions, that's pretty slow
